entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 2:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -17.2°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -22.7°C
Wind: W 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
